channel.title: Killer Cats
channel.description:
Hello,
On my server i recently had a problem with killer cats. Suddenly Killer cats appeared, they kill everyone but we can't kill them. When i banned the player they didn't attack the cats died. Is this a hack? And what can i do about it?

On my server i recently had a problem with killer cats. Suddenly Killer cats appeared, they kill everyone but we can’t kill them. When i banned the player they didn’t attack the cats died.
Is this a hack? And what can i do about it?[/quote] i’m not sure but the command is ::cat… close the runserver and compile then restart…add to rules ::cat results in an autoban…scares em
